name: Robba da Matti
address: 1127 Mainland St, Vancouver, BC V6B 5P2, Canada

hasMenuItem.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
hasMenuItem.description: Finely cured Guanciale coated in a free-range egg yolk & cracked pepper sauce with D.O.P. Parmesan cheese.  Enjoy a night Roman style!

hasMenuItem.name: Spaghetti allo Scoglio
hasMenuItem.description: A Venetian dish with garlic, chilies & tomatoes sauteed with scallops, tiger prawns, calamari, mussels & clams.

hasMenuItem.name: Pappardelle "Rosche Rosche"
hasMenuItem.description: Family recipe from Nonno Nicola. A hearty ragù, slow cooked in tomato sauce with various braised meats.

hasMenuItem.name: Gnocchi Pomodoro Basilico
hasMenuItem.description: Home-made Gnocchi with a Parmesan, fresh basil, and tomato sauce.  Topped with our D.O.P. Burrata cheese.

hasMenuItem.name: Bread with Olive Oil & Balsamic
hasMenuItem.description: A portion of our home-made, fresh baked bread served with Extra Virgin Olive Oil and Balsamic Vinegar.  Just like we do in Italy!

hasMenuItem.name: Poached Pear Salad With Burrata
hasMenuItem.description: Mixed greens with red wine poached pears, fresh Burrata cheese, and shaved almonds.  Served with a homemade balsamic reduction & extra virgin olive oil vinaigrette.

hasMenuItem.name: Lobster & Crab Ravioli
hasMenuItem.description: Fresh stuffed Lobster & Crab ravioli with a sautéed cherry tomato sauce. Finished with tiger prawns and Arugula salad.

hasMenuItem.name: Pasta al Pesto
hasMenuItem.description: Signature dish from Liguria.  Short pasta with homemade pesto sauce, Pecorino Romano, and toasted pistachios.  Topped with our D.O.P. Burrata cheese.

hasMenuItem.name: Pasta al Pesto (without Burrata)
hasMenuItem.description: Signature dish from Liguria.  Short pasta with homemade pesto sauce and Pecorino Romano cheese. Topped with toasted pistachios.

hasMenuItem.name: Bruschetta Leccese
hasMenuItem.description: Served on freshly baked bread, Prosciutto di Parma D.O.P., Gorgonzola cheese, a touch of fig marmalade & toasted pinenuts.

hasMenuItem.name: Children's Pasta al Pomodoro
hasMenuItem.description: Child sized portion of our home-made pasta with tomato sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Burrata Caprese
hasMenuItem.description: Fresh Roma tomatoes with our D.O.P. Burrata cheese served on a bed of Arugula salad.  Finished with homemade basil infused extra virgin olive oil.

hasMenuItem.name: Burrata Caprese
hasMenuItem.description: Fresh Roma tomatoes with our D.O.P. Burrata cheese served on a bed of Arugula salad.  Finished with homemade basil infused extra virgin olive oil.

hasMenuItem.name: Bread with Olive Oil & Balsamic
hasMenuItem.description: A portion of our home-made, fresh baked bread served with Extra Virgin Olive Oil and Balsamic Vinegar.  Just like we do in Italy!

hasMenuItem.name: Bread
hasMenuItem.description: Bread to start or additional bread, fresh from our oven.

hasMenuItem.name: Prosciutto & Burrata
hasMenuItem.description: Made to share, Prosciutto di Parma D.O.P. with our famous fresh Burrata which comes directly from Italy (Apulia Region) every week, to indulge your senses.

hasMenuItem.name: Bruschetta Leccese
hasMenuItem.description: Served on freshly baked bread, Prosciutto di Parma D.O.P., Gorgonzola cheese, a touch of fig marmalade & toasted pinenuts.

hasMenuItem.name: Insalata Toscana
hasMenuItem.description: A flavourful salad with tender Farro, crisp organic Kale, roasted cherry tomatoes, and a touch of sharp Pecorino cheese for a balanced, savoury taste.

hasMenuItem.name: Cozze alla Tarantina
hasMenuItem.description: Fresh mussels in a white wine and garlic reduction with bread.  If you can’t make it to Salento for vacation, might as well eat like you’re there.

hasMenuItem.name: Poached Pear Salad With Burrata
hasMenuItem.description: Mixed greens with red wine poached pears, fresh Burrata cheese, and shaved almonds.  Served with a homemade balsamic reduction & extra virgin olive oil vinaigrette.

hasMenuItem.name: Antipasto Misto
hasMenuItem.description: Made to share, the most traditional Italian starter.  A variety of cold cut meats & cheeses from diverse regions of Italy.

hasMenuItem.name: Lobster & Crab Ravioli
hasMenuItem.description: Fresh stuffed Lobster & Crab ravioli with a sautéed cherry tomato sauce. Finished with tiger prawns and Arugula salad.

hasMenuItem.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
hasMenuItem.description: Finely cured Guanciale coated in a free-range egg yolk & cracked pepper sauce with D.O.P. Parmesan cheese.  Enjoy a night Roman style!

hasMenuItem.name: Pasta con Funghi e Burrata al Tartufo
hasMenuItem.description: Our tagliatelle pasta topped with creamy truffle burrata, sautéed mushrooms, fresh tomatoes, and a hint of chili garlic.

hasMenuItem.name: Gnocchi Pomodoro Basilico
hasMenuItem.description: Home-made Gnocchi with a Parmesan, fresh basil, and tomato sauce.  Topped with our D.O.P. Burrata cheese.

hasMenuItem.name: Spaghetti allo Scoglio
hasMenuItem.description: A Venetian dish with garlic, chilies & tomatoes sauteed with scallops, tiger prawns, calamari, mussels & clams.

hasMenuItem.name: Tagliatelle con Ragù Rosé
hasMenuItem.description: Our home-made pasta with beef and pork in a rosé herb sauce. A rich delicious flavour experience.

hasMenuItem.name: Pasta al Pesto (without Burrata)
hasMenuItem.description: Signature dish from Liguria.  Short pasta with homemade pesto sauce and Pecorino Romano cheese. Topped with toasted pistachios.

hasMenuItem.name: Pappardelle "Rosche Rosche"
hasMenuItem.description: Family recipe from Nonno Nicola. A hearty ragù, slow cooked in tomato sauce with various braised meats.

hasMenuItem.name: Spaghetti alle Vongole
hasMenuItem.description: Manila clams in a perfectly balanced garlic, extra virgin olive oil, chili pepper and Pinot Grigio sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Pasta al Pesto
hasMenuItem.description: Signature dish from Liguria.  Short pasta with homemade pesto sauce, Pecorino Romano, and toasted pistachios.  Topped with our D.O.P. Burrata cheese.

hasMenuItem.description: Home-made Gnocchi with a Parmesan, fresh basil, and tomato sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Children's Pasta al Burro e Parmigiano
hasMenuItem.description: Child sized portion of our home-made pasta with a butter and Parmesan cheese sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Spaghetti con Crema di Limone e Gamberi
hasMenuItem.description: Spaghetti with a lemon, caper, chili, garlic sauce. Topped with sautéed tiger prawns. A zesty delight.

hasMenuItem.name: Tagliatelle con Ragù Rosso
hasMenuItem.description: Our home-made pasta with beef and pork in an herb and roasted tomato sauce. A rich delicious flavour experience.

hasMenuItem.name: Risotto alla Zucca con Guanciale
hasMenuItem.description: An Italian classic. Roasted squash enhances Arborio rice that has been slow cooked in a vegetable broth with onion, garlic, and finely cured Guanciale. A creamy, comforting dish.

hasMenuItem.name: Children's Pasta al Pomodoro
hasMenuItem.description: Child sized portion of our home-made pasta with tomato sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Risotto alla Zucca
hasMenuItem.description: An Italian classic. Roasted squash enhances Arborio rice that has been slow cooked in a vegetable broth with onion and garlic. A creamy, comforting dish.

review.reviewBody: Spaghetti Carbonara was incredibly salty and a bit watery but Guanciale was delightfully crisp. Gnocchi Pomodoro Basilico was al dente and delicious. Portions on the smaller side.
The Spaghetti alla Carbonara was so salty to the point where I couldnt even eat it and the pancetta was rock hard
This is my fav Italian restin the  city! Great service and always reas priced! Most inp delic !!!
Delivery bag was opened- dont know if its a small portion in a massive container or it was opened in delivery but overpriced for such a small portion
